Package com.github.actionfx.core.annotation

Annotation Type AFXDisableNode

  • @Target(FIELD)
@Retention(RUNTIME)
public @interface AFXDisableNode
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Node for defining, when this node shall be disabled (and when enabled).
    Author:
    koster

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      BooleanOp logicalOp
      In case more than one attribute is specified as part of this annotation, this boolean operation describes how the different attributes shall be logically linked with each other.
      java.lang.String[] whenAllContolsHaveUserValues
      Annotated node is disabled, if all controls specified in this attribute have a user value (i.e.
      java.lang.String[] whenAllControlsHaveValues
      Annotated node is disabled, if all controls specified in this attribute have a value (i.e.
      java.lang.String[] whenAtLeastOneContolHasUserValue
      Annotated node is disabled, if at least one of the controls specified in this attribute has a user value (i.e.
      java.lang.String[] whenAtLeastOneControlHasValues
      Annotated node is disabled, if at least one control specified in this attribute has a value (i.e.

    • Element Detail

      • whenAllContolsHaveUserValues

        java.lang.String[] whenAllContolsHaveUserValues
        Annotated node is disabled, if all controls specified in this attribute have a user value (i.e. a text in a TextField or selected values in a TableView).
        Returns:
        the list of controls
        Default:
        {}

      • whenAtLeastOneContolHasUserValue

        java.lang.String[] whenAtLeastOneContolHasUserValue
        Annotated node is disabled, if at least one of the controls specified in this attribute has a user value (i.e. a text in a TextField or selected values in a TableView).
        Returns:
        the list of controls
        Default:
        {}

      • whenAllControlsHaveValues

        java.lang.String[] whenAllControlsHaveValues
        Annotated node is disabled, if all controls specified in this attribute have a value (i.e. a text in a TextField or items set in a TableView).
        Returns:
        the list of controls
        Default:
        {}

      • whenAtLeastOneControlHasValues

        java.lang.String[] whenAtLeastOneControlHasValues
        Annotated node is disabled, if at least one control specified in this attribute has a value (i.e. a text in a TextField or items set in a TableView).
        Returns:
        the list of controls
        Default:
        {}

      • logicalOp

        BooleanOp logicalOp
        In case more than one attribute is specified as part of this annotation, this boolean operation describes how the different attributes shall be logically linked with each other. Possible values are BooleanOp.AND and BooleanOp.OR. Default is BooleanOp.AND.
        Returns:
        the logical operation how attributes are linked with each other. Default is BooleanOp.AND.
        Default:
        com.github.actionfx.core.annotation.BooleanOp.AND
